meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Annie Lyon Stephen Shaw David Gard Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6328.

td.p: Annie Lyon, a communications coordinator originally from Baltimore, Maryland
Stephen Shaw, a musician from Arlington, Texas
David Gard, a retail horticulturist from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts (whose 3-day cash winnings total $69,900)

tr.td: PEOPLE
7-LETTER WORDS
GAMBLING
(Alex: You have to name the artist; we'll give you some of the...)
LYRICS OF THE ARTIST
BRIDGES
WHAT'S YOUR SPECIALTY, DR.?

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Stephen: Who is Pat Nixon?)

Betty Ford

StephenAnnie
')
